{
  "schemaVersion": "2.2",
  "description": "logpresso logs",
  "mainSteps": [
    {
      "precondition": {
        "StringEquals": [
          "platformType",
          "Windows"
        ]
      },
      "action": "aws:runPowerShellScript",
      "name": "logpressoFIX_win",
      "inputs": {
        "timeoutSeconds": 30000,
        "runCommand": [
          "# Powershell script logpresso on Windows 64 bit server ",
          "# version 0.2",
          "",
          "$_check = Get-WmiObject -Class Win32_Product | where Name -eq 'AWS Command Line Interface v2' | select Name, Version",
          "if (-Not ($_check)){",
          "$PATH=\"C:\\Temp\"",
          "if (!(Test-Path $Path)){",
          "New-Item -itemType Directory -Path $Path",
          "}",
          "$command = \"[Net.ServicePointManager]::SecurityProtocol = [Net.SecurityProtocolType]::Tls12\"",
          "Invoke-Expression $command",
          "Invoke-WebRequest -Uri \"https://awscli.amazonaws.com/AWSCLIV2.msi\" -Outfile C:\\Temp\\AWSCLIV2.msi",
          "$arguments = \"/i `\"C:\\Temp\\AWSCLIV2.msi`\" /quiet\"",
          "Start-Process msiexec.exe -ArgumentList $arguments -Wait",
          "}",
          "$PATH=\"C:\\Temp\\logpresso\"",
          "$FILENAME=\"logpresso-log4j2-scan.zip\"",
          "",
          "if (!(Test-Path $PATH))",
          "{",
          "New-Item -itemType Directory -Path $PATH",
          "}",
          "",
          "Set-Location -Path $PATH",
          "",
          "[Net.ServicePointManager]::SecurityProtocol = [Net.SecurityProtocolType]::Tls12",
          "",
          "$LOGPRESSO_FILENAME='log4j2-scan.exe'",
          "",
          "if (-not(Test-Path -Path \".\\${LOGPRESSO_FILENAME}\" -PathType Leaf)) {",
          "try {",
          "$OS_ARCH=(Get-WmiObject Win32_OperatingSystem).OSArchitecture ",
          "If ( $OS_ARCH -eq '64-bit' ) { ",
          "$URL=\"https://github.com/logpresso/CVE-2021-44228-Scanner/releases/download/v2.7.2/logpresso-log4j2-scan-2.7.2-win64.zip\"",
          "} ",
          "If ( $OS_ARCH -eq '32-bit' ) { ",
          "Write-Output \"$OS_ARCH : OS Architecture not supported.\"",
          "break;",
          "} ",
          "Invoke-WebRequest -Uri $URL -OutFile $FILENAME",
          "Expand-Archive -Path $FILENAME -DestinationPath $PATH",
          "}",
          "",
          "catch {",
          "throw $_.Exception.Message",
          "}",
          "}",
          "",
          "$Expression = \".\\log4j2-scan.exe --all-drives --report-csv\"",
          "Write-Output \"Running Logpresso Scan and Fix \" ",
          "Write-Output \"Running Command: $Expression\"",
          "$Date= Get-Date -Format \"yyyymmdd\"",
          "$Time = Get-Date -Format \"HHmmmss\"",
          "$ReportlName = \"log4j2_scan_report\"",
          "",
          "$LOG_OUTPUT= $PATH + '\\' + 'logpresso_execution_log' + '_' + $Date+'_' + $Time + '.log'",
          "",
          "Invoke-Expression $Expression | Out-File -FilePath $LOG_OUTPUT",
          "$env:Path = [System.Environment]::GetEnvironmentVariable(\"Path\",\"Machine\")",
          "$env:Path += \";C:\\Program Files\\Amazon\\AWSCLIV2\"",
          "$INSTANCEID=Invoke-RestMethod -uri http://169.254.169.254/latest/meta-data/instance-id",
          "$FileNameLog = Get-ChildItem $PATH *.log | Sort-Object -Property LastWriteTime | Select-Object -Last 1 | % name",
          "$FullFilename = $PATH + '\\'+$FileNameLog",
          "$NewFileName = $PATH + '\\' + $INSTANCEID + '_' + $FileNameLog",
          "",
          "Move-Item -Path $FullFilename -Destination $NewFileName",
          "aws s3 cp $NewFileName s3://caps-central-logs/logpresso_scan/",
          ""
        ]
      }
    },
    {
      "precondition": {
        "StringEquals": [
          "platformType",
          "Linux"
        ]
      },
      "action": "aws:runShellScript",
      "name": "logpressoFIX_lin",
      "inputs": {
        "runCommand": [
          "#!/bin/bash",
          "# Bash script logpresso on RHEL 64 bit server ",
          "",
		      "if aws --version > /dev/null 2>&1; then",
          " echo \"aws cli already exists.\"",
          "else",
          " curl \"https://awscli.amazonaws.com/awscli-exe-linux-x86_64.zip\" -o \"awscliv2.zip\"",
          " unzip awscliv2.zip",
          " sudo ./aws/install",
          "fi",
          "WORKING_DIR=\"/tmp/logpresso-log4j2-scan\"",
          "",
          "if [ -d \"$WORKING_DIR\" ]; then",
          " echo \"Directory already exists.\"",
          "else ",
          " mkdir -v \"$WORKING_DIR\"",
          "fi ",
          " cd \"$WORKING_DIR\"",
          "",
          "# Get the machine Architecture",
          "",
          "ARCH=$(uname -m)",
          "",
          "if [ ! -f \"$FILENAME\" ]; then",
          "if [ $ARCH = \"arm64\" ]; then",
          "curl -s -L --max-redirs 10 https://github.com/logpresso/CVE-2021-44228-Scanner/releases/download/v2.7.2/logpresso-log4j2-scan-2.7.2-linux.tar.gz --output logpresso-log4j2-scan-2.7.2-linux-aarch64.tar.gz",
          "tar -xvzf logpresso-log4j2-scan-2.7.2-linux-aarch64.tar.gz",
          "elif [ $ARCH = \"x86_64\" ]; then",
          "#echo \"$ARCH\"",
          "curl -s -L --max-redirs 10 https://github.com/logpresso/CVE-2021-44228-Scanner/releases/download/v2.7.2/logpresso-log4j2-scan-2.7.2-linux.tar.gz --output logpresso-log4j2-scan-2.7.2-linux.tar.gz",
          "tar -xvzf logpresso-log4j2-scan-2.7.2-linux.tar.gz",
          "else",
          "echo \"Your Architecture '$ARCH' -> ITS NOT SUPPORTED.\"",
          "fi",
          "fi ",
          "",
          "echo -e \"log4j2_scan_report_$(date +%Y%m%d_%H%M%S).csv\"",
          "LOG_OUTPUT=\"logpresso_execution_log_$(date +%Y%m%d_%H%M%S).log\"",
          "",
          "./log4j2-scan / --report-csv 2>&1 | tee \"$LOG_OUTPUT\"",
          " LOG_FILENAME=$(ls -t *.log | head -n 1)",
          "",
          " # Fetching Instance ID ",
          " INSTANCEID=$(curl -s http://169.254.169.254/latest/meta-data/instance-id)",
          "",
          " LOGF=$(echo \"$LOG_FILENAME\" | cut -f 1 -d '.')",
          " # Renaming file , Add Instance ID ",
          " mv -v \"${LOGF}.log\" \"${INSTANCEID}_${LOGF}.log\"",
          " aws s3 cp ${INSTANCEID}_${LOGF}.log s3://caps-central-logs/logpresso_scan/",
          ""
        ]
      }
    }
  ]
}
Name: arn:aws:ssm:us-west-2:361500002652:document/logpresso_scan_collect_log
